Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money!
Reviews.Author: S. Kidder
Reviews.Content: I had been looking at this camera for a while but it was more expensive and didn't have the kit along with it.Compact and great pictures!

ProductInfo.Features:
Samsung WB150 14.2MP WI-Fi Digital Camera with 18x Optical Zoom and 3-inch LCD in White
8GB Memory Card
Well Padded Digital Camera Carrying Case with Pocket & Strap
Flexible Tripod Memory Card Wallet 3pc Cleaning Kit Microfiber Cloth & 3 Screen Protectors
**BONUS* 25 FREE Quality Photo Prints
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung WB150 14.2MP WI-Fi Digital Camera with 18x Optical Zoom and 3-inch LCD in White + 8GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
